lib

Class CryptoLib

  • java.lang.Object
    • lib.CryptoLib

  • public class CryptoLib
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of useful methods for CSF207's Coursework 2.

    • Method Detail

      • createKey

        public static javax.crypto.SecretKey createKey(byte[] keyData)
                                        throws java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException,
                                               java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                               java.security.InvalidKeyException
        Create a new DES key from a given byte array. You should use this whenever you need to create a DES key from a particular array of bytes.
        Parameters:
        keyData - An array of bytes to be used as a key. This is expected to be an array of 8 bytes.
        Returns:
        A DES key computed from the given byte array.
        Throws:
        java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        java.security.InvalidKeyException

      • smallIntToByteArray

        public static byte[] smallIntToByteArray(int i)
        Convert a small integer (between 0 and 65535 inclusively) into an array of bytes of length 2.
        Parameters:
        i - The integer to convert.
        Returns:
        An array of bytes of length 2 representing the given integer in bytes (big endian).

      • byteArrayToSmallInt

        public static int byteArrayToSmallInt(byte[] bytes)
        Convert an array of bytes of length 2 into a small integer (between 0 and 65535 inclusively).
        Parameters:
        bytes - A byte array of length 2 (big endian).
        Returns:

      • byteArrayToString

        public static java.lang.String byteArrayToString(byte[] bytes)
        Convert an array of bytes into a string representation (using the Base64 binary-to-text encoding scheme - See Wikipedia).
        Parameters:
        bytes - An array of bytes to be converted into a string.
        Returns:
        A string representation of the given bytes.

      • stringToByteArray

        public static byte[] stringToByteArray(java.lang.String s)
        Convert a string (in Base64 binary-to-text encoding scheme - See Wikipedia) into an array of bytes.
        Parameters:
        s - A string to be converted into an array of bytes.
        Returns:
        An array of bytes representing the given string.
